channel.title: Chrisscape
channel.description:
ok i know i posted this before but i lost my old one so here it is again soz about this and added its name
hi all i am a novice server developer and i am working on a server almost completley like the actual rs2 server here is more info project precentage complete 0.1% i am still calculating npc spawns non mem area 100% npc spawns mem area 100% special attacks 0% database 0% interface 0% this one might take a while this will be updated when i start on more stuff needs (player mods and gold crowns will be given if i am helped) npc spawn points quest stuff a wp to the beggining of tut island will be updated post of what you think
staff positions avalable advance coder - - - -
client developer - -
game moderators (gold crowns) no positions till atleast 10% complete
pm me if you want a position
rules no flaming not much off topic and enjoy your self
------------------------------------------------------
[code] all npc spawns are done :P [/code]
